docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 15 -- John W. Snyder, Secretary of the Treasury, announced today that the pound sterling convertibility provision of the United States loan to Great Britain had been fulfilled by the British Government.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 15 -- John W. Snyder, Secretary of the Treasury, announced today that the pound sterling convertibility provision of the United States loan to Great Britain had been fulfilled by the British Government.
docs.abstract: announces Brit fulfillment of promise to make sterling convertible

headline.main: BRITAIN FULFILLS SHIFT ON STERLING; Snyder Says Convertibility Is Effective in All but Fourteen Nations Beset by Delays BRAKE ON LOAN STUDIED Washington and London Seek Slower Spending -- Easing of Trade Clause Pondered

byline.original: By WALTER H. WAGGONERSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: LONDON, July 15 -- Signing of the Anglo-Uruguayan agreement on sterling balances was the signal for a flurry in Uruguay rail stocks in stock markets here today. A British mission, it is understood, will leave for Uruguay shortly to discuss purchase...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 15 -- Signing of the Anglo-Uruguayan agreement on sterling balances was the signal for a flurry in Uruguay rail stocks in stock markets here today. A British mission, it is understood, will leave for Uruguay shortly to discuss purchase of the railway by the State.

headline.main: BONDS AND SHARES ON LONDON MARKET; Uruguay Rail Stocks Climb Sharply on Strength of Agreement on Sterling

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: JERUSALEM, July 15 -- Two top-grade Irgun Zvai Leumi terrorists and one second-stringer were among fifteen wanted men sifted out of a large-scale screening process today in the sealed-off city of Nathanya, where the British are trying to find two of...
docs.lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM, July 15 -- Two top-grade Irgun Zvai Leumi terrorists and one second-stringer were among fifteen wanted men sifted out of a large-scale screening process today in the sealed-off city of Nathanya, where the British are trying to find two of their sergeants kidnapped early Saturday.
docs.abstract: Brit police find 3 top terrorists, Nathanya

headline.main: 2 TOP TERRORISTS FOUND IN NATHANYA; 13 Others Also Held as British Screen 1,427 in Hunt for Kidnapped Soldiers

docs.snippet: LONDON, July 15 -- The pound sterling, within certain limitations, became convertible into all other currencies for current transactions today. As a result there are a lot of frightened Treasury officials, bankers and economists keeping their fingers...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 15 -- The pound sterling, within certain limitations, became convertible into all other currencies for current transactions today. As a result there are a lot of frightened Treasury officials, bankers and economists keeping their fingers crossed.

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Bonds of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development changed hands yesterday for the first time. The first dealing took place on the New York Stock Exchange's public market immediately after the Exchange opened for trading, and while...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bonds of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development changed hands yesterday for the first time. The first dealing took place on the New York Stock Exchange's public market immediately after the Exchange opened for trading, and while the bank was still being pressed for allotments from dealers all over the nation.
docs.abstract: initial issues oversubscribed by noon of 1st day; NYSE ceremony and marketing described; E Schram and Pres McCloy comment; Schram, McCloy and K Vararessos illus at ceremony; comment

headline.main: WORLD BANK BONDS QUICKLY MARKETED; First Offerings Made on Floor of Stock Exchange Here and Bring Premiums PRICES LEVEL OFF LATER Oversubscription Announced at Noon -- 1,600 Dealers to Receive Allotments

keywords.value: INTERNATIONAL BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT

docs.snippet: LONDON, July. 16 -- With many buyers absent in the stock markets here today, the three-week account opened with an all-round decline in prices.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July. 16 -- With many buyers absent in the stock markets here today, the three-week account opened with an all-round decline in prices.

headline.main: BONDS AND SHARES ON LONDON MARKET; Prices Decline Due to Absence of Demand as New 3-Week Account Gets Under Way

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Harlem, one of the worst reservoirs of tuberculosis in the nation, is likely to become a vast experimental laboratory for the vaccine BCG in a controlled fight against the disease, it became known yesterday at the close of the Fifth International...
docs.lead_paragraph: Harlem, one of the worst reservoirs of tuberculosis in the nation, is likely to become a vast experimental laboratory for the vaccine BCG in a controlled fight against the disease, it became known yesterday at the close of the Fifth International Congress of Pediatrics at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel.

headline.main: TUBERCULOSIS WAR MAPPED IN HARLEM; Plan for Experiments There With BCG Vaccine Is Outlined at Pediatrics Meeting SUCCESS IN EUROPE CITED Prejudice Against Prophylactic Widely Used Abroad Now Reported Waning in U.S.

docs.snippet: LONDON, July 17 -- Business in stock markets here today generally was small, with few price changes of any importance.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 17 -- Business in stock markets here today generally was small, with few price changes of any importance.

headline.main: BONDS AND SHARES ON LONDON MARKET; Few Changes of Importance Occur in Prices, With Business Again Slow

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Eleven modern hotels will be erected in the next four years in Latin America to house visiting business men and tourists from the United States, it was announced here yesterday. The cost will be $75,000,000.
docs.lead_paragraph: Eleven modern hotels will be erected in the next four years in Latin America to house visiting business men and tourists from the United States, it was announced here yesterday. The cost will be $75,000,000.
docs.abstract: Intercontinental Hotel Corp plans 11 hotels for US tourists; W S Whittaker comments

headline.main: 11 Hotels to Rise in Latin America For U.S. Tourists, Business Men; 11 HOTELS TO RISE IN LATIN AMERICA
